body:
* pkgconfig fixes a "libffi.a requires -fPIC" build error (i.e. unrelated to the gcc issue...)
* the patches solve the mentioned problem on GCC 7.x
* patch for ruby 2.3 (also applies to 2.2) from: https://bugs.ruby-lang.org/issues/13150#note-14
* patch for ruby 2.4 from https://github.com/ruby/ruby/commit/8788489ca967599f83d96083f244f91c83286a88.patch
title: fix ruby build on gcc >= 7
